alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Greenville Mountains; Northern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 2:38PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Greenville and northwestern Spartanburg Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 238 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Columbus, or near Campobello, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Campobello, Tigerville, Lake Bowen, Lake Robinson, Landrum, Gowensville, North Saluda Reservoir, Glassy Mountain and Fingerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Greenville Mountains; Northern Spartanburg
